docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Feb. 11-- The National Institute of Mental Health released today preliminary findings on a new drug that shows promise for narcotics addicts who have withdrawn from heroin and want to stay away from it.

headline.main: NEW DRUG SHOWS HOPE FOR ADDICTS; Studies by U.S. Indicate It Can Curb Re-Addiction

docs.abstract: Natl Mental Health Inst repts new drug cyclazocine promising aid in curbing re-addiction
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Feb. 11-- The National Institute of Mental Health released today preliminary findings on a new drug that shows promise for narcotics addicts who have withdrawn from heroin and want to stay away from it.

byline.original: By ROBERT B. SEMPLE Jr. Special to The New York Times
